archimate:Requirement.name: NF_EN_5
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a service manager I need to understand the likely increase in the capacity of the system based upon our future needs (probabilistic forecasting based on wave ensembles, inundation and impact mapping and a greater array of tailored forecasting products) so that I can understand what the costs of these activities is likely to be and whether there are any system restrictions that need to be considered.
